docs.title: quickbox
docs.text:
quickbox is a minimalist macOS quick-capture inbox.

Core goal: capture fast, return to work immediately.

docs.title: Principles
docs.text:
• Speed over feature volume
  • Minimal visual and cognitive load
  • Local-first data
  • Practical, reliable daily operation

docs.title: Contributing
docs.text:
Quick contribution rules for quickbox:

  • Keep scope focused and minimal
  • Run tests before opening a PR
  • Include screenshots for UI changes
  • Avoid unrelated file changes

Full guide: CONTRIBUTING.md.

docs.title: Why not full project/task management?
docs.text: quickbox is optimized for quick capture and lightweight triage.

docs.title: Where are files stored?
docs.text: By default: ~/Documents/Quickbox, unless changed in Settings.

docs.title: How do I reset settings?
docs.text: Use Reset to defaults in Settings.

docs.title: Requirements
docs.text:
• macOS 14+
  • Xcode 16+

docs.title: Run locally
docs.text:
open quickbox.xcodeproj

Select quickbox scheme and run.

docs.title: Run tests
docs.text: xcodebuild test -project quickbox.xcodeproj -scheme quickbox -destination 'platform=macOS' -only-testing:quickboxTests

docs.title: Privacy
docs.text: quickbox is local-first.

docs.title: Stored data
docs.text:
• tasks in local markdown files
  • app preferences in UserDefaults

docs.title: Crash diagnostics
docs.text:
Disabled by default.

When enabled, diagnostics include technical metadata only (version, OS, operation context). Task text content is excluded.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
• Apple Developer account configured
  • Developer ID signing identity installed
  • Sparkle signing keys generated (generate_keys)
  • SPARKLE_PUBLIC_ED_KEY set in Xcode build settings for quickbox target
  • Notary profile configured:
xcrun notarytool store-credentials quickbox-notary --apple-id <apple-id> --team-id <team-id> --password <app-specific-password>

docs.title: 1) Build archive
docs.text: scripts/release/build_archive.sh

docs.title: 2) Export signed app
docs.text: TEAM_ID=<TEAM_ID> scripts/release/export_app.sh

docs.title: 3) Notarize + staple
docs.text: NOTARY_PROFILE=quickbox-notary scripts/release/notarize_and_staple.sh

docs.title: 4) Build DMG + checksum
docs.text: scripts/release/build_dmg.sh

docs.title: 5) Publish appcast
docs.text:
VERSION=1.0.0-beta.1 BUILD=1 DOWNLOAD_URL=https://github.com/alperen2/quickbox/releases/download/v1.0.0-beta.1/quickbox.dmg scripts/release/publish_appcast.sh

Release workflow now generates both appcast.xml and appcast-beta.xml. Host both feeds on GitHub Pages.

docs.title: 6) GitHub release
docs.text:
• Upload .dmg and .sha256
  • Attach release notes
  • Verify download and update flow on clean machine

docs.title: Rollback
docs.text:
• Repoint appcast to last known good version
  • Publish patch release with fix notes

docs.title: Release Process
docs.text:
See:

  • docs/release-playbook.md
  • scripts under scripts/release/

High-level flow:

  1. Build archive
  2. Export app
  3. Notarize and staple
  4. Build DMG + checksum
  5. Publish appcast
  6. Create GitHub release

docs.title: GitHub Actions secrets
docs.text:
Required for release workflow:

  • APPLE_TEAM_ID
  • APPLE_NOTARY_PROFILE
  • APPLE_ID
  • APPLE_APP_SPECIFIC_PASSWORD

docs.text:
1. Hotkey not working

docs.title: Triage Steps
docs.text:
• Confirm app version and macOS version
  • Reproduce in latest beta build
  • Ask for diagnostics log path only (no task content)

docs.title: Storage Access Recovery
docs.text:
1. Open Settings
  2. Re-select storage folder
  3. Retry capture
